introduction: Data Science is recognized as an emerging subject as per AICTE (https://www.aicteindia.org/sites/default/files/UG_Emerging.pdf), and the Data Science Lab is a critical component of the same. The proposed lab focuses on fundamental and applied concepts of Data Science and Machine Learning, aligned with the AICTE UG CSE 2022 Curriculum. The lab emphasizes hands-on learning through experiments covering data handling, visualization, preprocessing, machine learning algorithms, model evaluation, and ethical considerations, thereby bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application.

experiments.name: Introduction to NumPy, Arrays and Array Operations
Movie Review Sentiment Analysis using Naïve Bayes
Student Performance Prediction Using Linear Regression
Comparison of Linear, Lasso, and Ridge Regression
Predicting Credit Card Fraud using Support Vector Machine

objective: The objective of this lab is to provide students with a strong foundational understanding of Data Science concepts and techniques. The lab covers numerical computing, data manipulation, data visualization, exploratory data analysis, data preprocessing, supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms, model evaluation, validation techniques, and ethical aspects of data science. This lab enables students to gain practical exposure to real-world datasets and develop the ability to analyze data, build predictive models, and interpret results effectively.

courseAlignment.description: The syllabi of this lab aligns to the following universities in India.
universities: IIT Kanpur – CS771A: Introduction to Machine Learning- https://cse.iitk.ac.in/pages/CS771.html
BITS Pilani – CSF320: Foundation of Data Science - https://nitinvinayak.github.io/public/pdfs/CS_F320_2266.pdf
